channel.title: Sex on Linguistrix
channel.description: Recent content in Sex on Linguistrix

item.title: Vanilla Sex—Female Organs and Aromatic Beans
item.description: The SMBC comic from a few days ago goes like this: Something didn’t seem right about the whole thing but SMBC is usually grounded on at least some fact, so I decided to explore, and it turned out to be more interesting than I had earlier thought. It turns out that the term vanilla (used to describe the beans) does come from the Latin root vagina, but it’s not as simple as that.

item.title: If you think it’s disgusting, too bad for you.
item.description: [This post is second in the series of general posts on Linguistrix (the first one was Stupid Analogues are like Stupid Analogies). I choose to include such posts on the blog because I find the topic to be of significant intellectual/academic interest.] [This post is second in the series of general posts on Linguistrix (the first one was Stupid Analogues are like Stupid Analogies).
